name: Where are all the aliens
description:
This game was first made as a game jam game, but for my 50 game jams anniversary, I have decided to make it into a  small celebration game. The game is mostly a humours museum game, with a bit of puzzles. All visuals and music in game, comes from my jam games.

Sound is an important part of the game, so I really recommend playing it with headphones.

Controls:

  • WASD: moves the player around.
  • Move mouse: rotates the player.
  • Left mouse key/E/F: To interacted with paintings and other objects.
  • Escape: To quit the game. There is no pause menu.

SPOILERS:

Please don't read this before you begin to play the game, but because this mostly is meant as a museum game, I will here give the answer to the first puzzle 1) Green 2)Green 3)Green 4)Red 5)Red 6)Green.

Good luck and have fun.

And yes I know I have actorly made 54 jam games, but who really counts.
